summary: The Department of Justice is responsible for collecting from defendants who have been ordered by a federal court to pay restitution. We evaluated DOJ's collection process in 2018 and made 2 recommendations. This report shows how they were addressed. We recommended measures and goals to better gauge the success of DOJ collection efforts. DOJ said these would be finalized in FY 2021, a delay of...
title: Federal Criminal Restitution: Department of Justice Has Ongoing Efforts to Improve Its Oversight of the Collection of Restitution and Tracking the Use of Forfeited Assets
